
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut)
target_compile_options(contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_include_directories(contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/client/metadata
)
target_link_libraries(contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  core-client-metadata
  minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm
  udf-service-stub
  yql-sql-pg_dummy
)
target_sources(contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/client/metadata/ut/functions_metadata_ut.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
target_allocator(contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut
  system_allocator
)
vcs_info(contrib-ydb-core-client-metadata-ut)
